item.title: The 80/20 Rule of Data Science: Focus on What Actually Moves the Needle
item.description:
The 80/20 Rule of Data Science: Focus on What Actually Moves the Needle

One of the biggest mistakes data science teams make is spending too much time on the wrong things.

Itâ€™s easy to fall into the trap of optimizing a model for another 0.2% accuracy, building complex pipelines for edge cases, or experimenting endlessly without delivering real impact. But the harsh reality is that 80% of business impact comes from just 20% of the work.
